page.title: 18Land in Waltham St Lawrence
page.content:
The area is mainly farmland and woodland. There are six farms in the area:- Church, Paradise, Ewarts, Whitfields, Haines Hill and Stanlake Stud.
Most of the{farmland}in the South and North of the area is arable land. This year the main crops are{Wheat}and {Oats}. The rest of the farming in the area is grassland used for grazing{ {Cattle}or{Horses}. There are two{Stud {Farms}which concentrate on breeding various types of horses.
The{woodland}in the area is mainly{ {Deciduous}with only a very small amount of{Coniferous Plantation}. Some of the woods are a part of large estates and are managed by gamekeepers for the production of{Game}such as{ {Pheasants}.
